            "added",

                "key5": "value5"
            }
        ],

            "deleted",

        ],

            }
        ]

        "baz": [
            "changed",

                "bas",
                "bars"
            ]
        ],
        "foo": [
            "non_modified",
            "bar"
        ]
    },

        "added",

            "fee": "100500"
        }
    ],
